title: Panic in nightly using repr(u128) with constant higher than is representable

labels.name: A-debuginfo
labels.description: Area: Debugging information in compiled programs (DWARF, PDB, etc.)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(repr128, const_int_pow)] #[repr(u128)] #[derive(Debug, Clone, Copy, PartialOrd, Ord, PartialEq, Eq)] pub enum Prefix { Yobi = 1024u128.pow(8), } impl Prefix { pub fn from_str(s: &str) -> Option { use self::Prefix::*; match s { "Yi" => Some(Yobi), _ => None, } } } fn main() { println!("{:?}", Prefix::from_str("Yi")); } ``` ### Meta Link to playpen: `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.48.0-nightly (154f1f544 2020-10-02) binary: rustc commit-hash: 154f1f544dd68f7b53ff8d9952811e855f4c2d7c commit-date: 2020-10-02 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.48.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `1`, right: `1208925819614629174706177`', compiler/rustc_codegen_llvm/src/debuginfo/metadata.rs:1703:33 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.48.0-nightly (8fe73e80d 2020-10-01) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden error: could not compile `playground` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/8fe73e80d762bc575040239fc05fb1c612873554/library/std/src/panicking.rs:483 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/8fe73e80d762bc575040239fc05fb1c612873554/library/std/src/panicking.rs:437 2: as core::iter::traits::iterator::Iterator>::fold 3: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::metadata::MemberDescriptionFactory::create_member_descriptions 4: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::metadata::RecursiveTypeDescription::finalize 5: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::metadata::type_metadata 6: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::metadata::type_metadata::{{closure}} 7: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::metadata::type_metadata 8: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::::create_function_debug_context::get_function_signature 9: rustc_codegen_llvm::debuginfo::::create_function_debug_context 10: rustc_codegen_ssa::mir::codegen_mir 11: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_instance 12: ::define 13: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 14: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 15: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 16: rustc_codegen_ssa::base::codegen_crate 17: ::codegen_crate 18: rustc_session::utils::::time 19: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 20: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 21: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 22: rustc_span::with_source_map 23: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 24: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. ```
